room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We did this as a family. It was so much fun! Each person figured out a clue and while we still needed help to escape a good time was had by everyone. They also make surfacing the clues at the end fun. We can't wait until they open their new mystery rooms in 2016!

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We celebrated 2 birthdays in our group of 5. Very challenging puzzles. Great camaraderie with the 2 young people added to our group. I'd recommend this for family groups.

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: It was a birthday party blast. The clues really made us think I would recommend it and try it again

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Did James Bomb. I've wanted to do this for quite a while but wanted to do it with people I knew. Finally I just decided to take a date and go with whoever showed up. The other group was awesome and I am actually glad I went not knowing everyone. When we got led into the room my first thought was, "$30 for this? Umm, okay." But it just keep getting better and better as time went on. Left feeling very glad I went and would recommend it to anyone.

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We went yesterday for a date day with our best friends. We did the James Bomb mission and completed it with 3 awesome strangers. It was so fun and something new and fresh to do. We will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Almost missed the parking lot, the building is so nondescript but this place has a super friendly and professional staff and well planned objectives. Even with a failed mission I had tons of fun and cannot wait to try the other scenario!

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We did this as a family. It was so much fun! Each person figured out a clue and while we still needed help to escape a good time was had by everyone. They also make surfacing the clues at the end fun. We can't wait until they open their new mystery rooms in 2016!
